text: Based in [[Skyway]], the Gold Line provides the most luxurious [[skycoach]]es in [[Sharn]]. Even the most basic Gold Line coach is well appointed and maintained, and charges twice the usual price for travel (see the <<navAndScrollToHeader "Wards of Sharn" "Travel Time">> section of [[Wards of Sharn]] for specifics). The Gold Line also has three “party barges” and two //gilded fliers//, which are twice as fast as the typical [[skycoach]]. Gold Line coaches are usually only found in [[Skyway]] and the [[upper districts|upper ward]], and its higher end coaches can only be booked by appointment.
title: Gold Line
